findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fee.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or entities from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketingDivisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the buyBackUpperLimit.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the buyBack feature.

findings.title: Owner can change presale contract address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the presale contract address.

findings.title: Owner can change charity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the charity fee.

findings.title: Owner can change charity address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the charity address.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to enable or disable presale modes at will.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, potentially retaking privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.
